Events.displayName: Oracle Web Services Manager - Policy Manager

Event.name: CreateAssertionTemplate
Event.HelpText: Generated when an assertion template is created.

Attribute.name: Version
Attribute.HelpText: Version of assertion template that was created.

Event.name: DeleteAssertionTemplate
Event.HelpText: Generated when an assertion template is deleted.

Attribute.name: Version
Attribute.HelpText: Version of assertion template that was deleted.

Attribute.name: ToVersion
Attribute.HelpText: Upper end when deleting a range of assertion template versions.

Event.name: ModifyAssertionTemplate
Event.HelpText: Generated when an assertion template is modified.

Attribute.name: Version
Attribute.HelpText: Version of assertion template that was modified.

Event.name: CreateIntent
Event.HelpText: Generated when an intent is created.

Attribute.name: Version
Attribute.HelpText: Version of intent that was created.

Event.name: DeleteIntent
Event.HelpText: Generated when an intent is deleted.

Attribute.name: Version
Attribute.HelpText: Version of intent that was deleted.

Attribute.name: ToVersion
Attribute.HelpText: Upper end when deleting a range of intent versions.

Event.name: ModifyIntent
Event.HelpText: Generated when an intent is modified.

Attribute.name: Version
Attribute.HelpText: Version of intent that was modified.

Event.name: CreatePolicy
Event.HelpText: Generated when a policy is created.

Attribute.name: Version
Attribute.HelpText: Version of policy that was created.

Event.name: DeletePolicy
Event.HelpText: Generated when a policy is deleted.

Attribute.name: Version
Attribute.HelpText: Version of policy that was deleted.

Attribute.name: ToVersion
Attribute.HelpText: Upper end when deleting a range of policy versions.

Event.name: ModifyPolicy
Event.HelpText: Generated when a policy is modified.

Attribute.name: Version
Attribute.HelpText: Version of policy that was modified.

Event.name: CreatePolicySet
Event.HelpText: Generated when a policy set is created.

Attribute.name: Version
Attribute.HelpText: Version of policy set that was created.

Event.name: DeletePolicySet
Event.HelpText: Generated when a policy set is deleted.

Attribute.name: Version
Attribute.HelpText: Version of policy set that was deleted.

Attribute.name: ToVersion
Attribute.HelpText: Upper end when deleting a range of policy set versions.

Event.name: ModifyPolicySet
Event.HelpText: Generated when a policy set is modified.

Attribute.name: Version
Attribute.HelpText: Version of policy set that was modified.
